1.content: Things weren't always this way. You didn't always have to play the role of the "little sister" for the amusement of those who were supposed to respect you. You see your older sibling(s), remembering that, until recently, you were once their ___.
1.title: Prologue

11.content:
Who were you before you went from big sister to little sister?

Laura Phillips: You were a grade school student, soon on your way to middle school, who was 11-years old. You would tease your sister Emily (7) until she made that wish that her big sister would have to act nicer to her. Hopefully, Emily will act nice to you when you become more like your baby sister Molly (3).

Melanie Jones: You were a college student of 19-years who did not take your academic achievements seriously. It all becomes awkward when one night at a frat party you barely even remember makes you too young for college, to the amusement of your brother Skylar (14) and sister Margot (9).

Jessica Morton: You were a 17-year old cheerleader who was popular in high school. All of the other girls were envious of your curves, especially your budding sister Kelly (12), until you start going through puberty in reverse from a strange genetic condition. Kelly and your brother Lionel (7) can't help but find this amusing.

Ashley Summers: You were an overly-vain 23-year old girl who would make herself an epitome of feminine charm through unhealthy habits such as multiple corrective surgeries and eating disorders. Your womanly beauty will not last long, though, when these treatments start to backfire and make you look more like a little girl. You have to turn to those like your tomboy sister Harriet (16) for help.
11.title: Big Sister

111.content: You remember angrily how until a few days ago you were the big sister. You had teased your baby sister Emily about her bedwetting for the 5 Billionth time, but that night she wished on a shooting star and it turned out to be Magic! The next day:
111.title: Laura Phillips

choices: 4-6 (Younger than Emily but older than Molly)
1112.content: How Young did you get?
1112.title: You Woke up Younger

11123.content:
"What the-?" You squeak with your new voice. "What happened to me? Why is everything so big?" Your thoughts get interrupted from Emily's squeals of joy. Your heart sinks in terror from how her eyes stare down at you like that of a zealous predator.

"I guess my wish came true after all, you brat!" Before you could try to tell her off on who's the brat, Emily peels away your bed-sheets. From underneath lies the newfound shame of your...
11123.title: 5-year old middle child

choices: everything in your room looks bigger
113.content:
You have returned home from cheer-leading practice earlier than usual due to not suddenly not feeling well. As you take off your uniform to switch to your pajamas, Kelly walks in from the partially open door.

"Oh, hey..." your sister mutters with disgust. "Did you come back so soon to get yourself more silicon injections?"

"Go away, brat. I'm not in the mood right now." With that, Kelly grumbles and walks away as you straighten out your bra. You sigh as you do this, recalling when your family life starting getting complicated. Ever since you started puberty, you had quickly blossomed to the point where you have actually grown E-cup breasts to this day. Meanwhile, your sister has barely grown at all despite being of that age at this point and only barely needs a training bra. You kept telling her that she will grow eventually, but you guess it always came off as patronizing when you got to develop so much in so little time with no effort of your own.

You decide to ultimately ignore her all-too-common jealous behavior and get some sleep soon so you can feel better in the morning. After treating yourself to dinner, drinking some water with vitamins, and making sure whatever homework you have is already done, you immediately go to bed. You feel a little hot and uncomfortable under your sheets, but you do eventually manage to fall asleep.

When you wake up next morning, you find that ___.
113.title: Jessica Morton

115.content:
Hmm... no? Alright. I like a challenge... sometimes. How about these choices?

Nicole Anderson: You were a 16-year old girl with a brother named Nathan (8), who wanted to be able to spend time with you since he had no one else he can go to socialize. However, you didn't really want to spend time with him and found him to be rather annoying. However, during a night where you were planning to go out on a date, your plans were ruined when your brother made a wish that ends making you younger and him into your teenage big sister. Will you be able to explain this to your parents?

Lana Porter: You were a 19-year old girl who works part-time as a lifeguard in your neighborhood community pool during the summer. However, it seems like sitting on your post under the summer heat is playing tricks on your mind, whether it's in the form of distracting you to the point you forget small details or even feeling like the heat is causing your previous skin-tight suit to expand slightly. Eventually, you find that you seem to be shrinking. Whether it's really the heat or the water or something else, you are not sure as to why this is happening. As days pass, you would hope that it won't be a recurring thing that builds up, especially with you needing to return to college in the fall and all the little kids and their parents who will see you like this. You also hope you won't have to start borrowing clothes from your little sister Luna (10) whom is part of the neighborhood swim team.
115.title: someone else

1153.content:
Alright, fine. How about these?

Maddie Trevor: You were a 15-year old girl who was asked by your parents to look after your 5-year old sister Mary while they are out for their anniversary. When your fussy and unappreciative sister accidentally breaks an antique mirror, though, you two swap ages with no sign of being able to swap back.

Brittany Oliver: You were a 14-year old girl you was getting too old for Halloween. You did not appreciate that you had to take your 7-year old sister Jill for trick-or-treating either. It will become apparent soon enough, though, that the more scares there are that surprise you, the younger you will become.
1153.title: I want a different story

12.content:
Who were you and why did you turn into a little girl?

Paul Evans: You were a high-school student who was just about ready for his 18th birthday and was only a few months away from graduating and going to college. However, a reckless car accident on your part has caused to become hospitalized. Strangely, the only way to save your life was to have your brain transferred into the body of a little girl. You have to continue living with your family of two siblings, Mike (14) and Jade (8), who try and sometimes fail to not make fun of your new body.

Thomas Powell: You were a 22-year old college football player who was respected and admired by those such as his little brothers Shawn (12) and Gabriel (6). However, after being exposed to and experiencing the side-effects of experimental steroids, you were expelled from college and sent back home as the sole female child of the family.

Patrick Ross: Before your change, you were a 15-year old young man who had well-intentions. However, a misunderstanding from a girl who goes to your school and turns out to be a witch leads to him being cursed to live life as a little girl. Your 8-year old sister Heather tries to help you adjust to being a girly girl, whether you like it or not, to the best of her ability.

Elliot Cole: Before your change, you had recently turned 11-years old. You were with your friends at school until some contaminated lunch milk causes abnormal physical changes. You just hope you won't have to borrow your 5-year old sister Wendy's clothes.
12.title: Big Brother

124.content:
Elliot had to be taken home from elementary school soon after he had lunch. He didn't say much and had developed a nasty fever. His mother tried to get answers from the school on whether it is was from something her son ate, but she didn't get any contextual information.Having been led to the conclusion that Elliot simply had the flu, she let her son get some rest in his room. She wondered if she should contact a doctor or if the illness would eventually go away on its own. She told her husband about what happened and told Elliot's little sister to stay away from her brother's room, though she didn't mention why to her. After making sure to give her bed-ridden son some medicine and nutritional soup, she let him be for the night, hoping for the best.

That leads to the next morning when Elliot had some strength to get up. Immediately, he sees that his clothes have become extremely baggy on him. He figures that he has gotten skinny until he soon learns that he looks like a...
124.title: Elliot Cole

125.content:
Alright. So you're not any of those people. How about these people?

Matt Wilson: You were an 18-year old boy who was studying for his final exams. However, after not feeling well one night, you wake up much smaller and cuter than you were before. With only a week until the exams start and only your brother Josh (age 15) to help contact the school on your behalf, can you find a way to graduate high school and/or change back?

Ethan Brown: You are an 18-year old boy who enjoys video games and anime. You purchased a wand prop from a magical girl series you secretly enjoy. You quickly find out that magic is real after all and that wand has chosen you to be its owner. However, it seems that, in order to use the wand's power or even wield it, your body is turned into that of a younger girl. Whatever you do with your magic is your choice. The only issue is that you have to be careful with not attracting attention from your sister Mia (age 16) and your brother Noah (age 12), who will both probably find amusement from your magical girl form.
125.title: someone else

1252.content:
You hurry over to the front door immediately when you heard the doorbell ring. You open the door and are excited to find the package you had ordered online delivered to you and left on the porch. Taking a kitchen knife with you to cut open the box, you take the box back to your room. If the package really does contain what you asked for, it would be better if your siblings didn't see what was inside. Slicing through the tape binding the box together, you pry it open and take out a pink plastic wand from a sea of packing peanuts.

"Oh, sweet. It's finally here." You mutter to yourself. The wand is a collectors' item for an anime series you have been binge watching lately in private. Your brother and sister already make fun of you and call an 'otaku geek', but you felt that they would only make fun of you more from being a fan of a franchise about a moe magical girly girl and her slice of life adventures. Just for fun, you wave the wand and call out the main character's catchphrase, not knowing what is to come right after that point.

"Huh?" You pause out of confusion from the gentle hum coming out the wand. Without warning, you get swarmed in a blinding barrage of stars and hearts made of light. Before you can process whether actual magic is in play, you find your clothes becoming loose on you. Whatever muscle you had fades away, leaving behind a dainty frame without any body hair. You squeak with a much higher pitch than you thought possible for you from the pressure on your chest. Having already lost half a foot in height, your clothes become really loose on you. However, your clothes start to match your body again in size. Your pants in particular shrink even further in height and blossoms outward, creating a new skirt/dress for you. Only when the hair on your scalp lengthens to reach your back and your boxers change into panties that fit snugly on you does your transformation stop. You wobble around for a few seconds to get over whatever sensation of dizziness lingered before you look at yourself and your much bigger room.

"Holy crap!" You squeal out of surprise and excitement. "I'm a girl! I'm a real magical girl!" You did not know whether you should be concerned or not, but, either way, you needed to see what you have become. You look onto the mirror hanging on your closet door to confirm what happened. Indeed, you are a girl... or rather the girl you would have been if you were born as such. You also see that you are now actually the same age as the owner of the magical wand. How old are you?
1252.title: Ethan Brown

12521.content: What type of girl were you ?
12521.title: 14-years old

1253.content:
I got some more choices for you. What do you think?

Lucas Campbell: You were once a normal 16-year old boy who would occasionally get along with your little brother Felix (age, 10). However, one day, the two of you get caught into a teleporter accident that gets your genetic information mixed up. Not only do both of you end up swapping ages, but both of you also end up with your Y-chromosomes having been mutated into X-chromosomes. With you being a budding grade school girl and your new buxom older sister quickly fitting in well into your old high school, you just hope the two of you can eventually change back without any awkwardness from each other's male best friends.

Harry Sutherland: You were a trouble-making 14-year old boy. You and your well-behaved little sister Cindy (age, 8) were both looking forward to Christmas, each of you desiring something new for the holidays. You have no idea what to expect though when you suddenly lose consciousness after hearing some jingling bells and hoof-steps on the roof during late Christmas Eve. By the time you wake up next morning, you wonder why you have been moved under the living room Christmas tree. Not to mention, you wonder why everything looks so huge while you are wearing a dress littered with fancy present bows.
1253.title: neither of them

choices: you don't even know why, how, and where you got teleported
your friends and family see you like this first
12531.content:
"Wait!" You recall shouting as your brother approached you and a blinding light engulfed the two of you. The only thing you could sense was the sound of your screams as you two got torn apart into separate atoms. After a while in what almost felt like a realm outside of time, your other senses started to return as your atoms fused back together and you started seeing yourself in a somewhat difference location. When you felt your legs returning to you, you fell over from disorientation and landed on something firm yet soft. It took a few more seconds to find that you have found yourself lying on a young woman's buxom chest.

"Ah!" You got up in a panic and blushed. "I'm so sorry!" It was then that you realized a few things. She was your age and, yet, was a lot bigger than you. The really weird thing about her, though, is that she is wearing your clothes. However, it doesn't seem like they fit too well since her curves got in the way. You also found that you are not in your usual state either judging from your sudden voice and clothing changes. You definitely seemed to be more a child than anything, especially considering that you are wearing your little brother's clothes and they were slightly loose on you.

"Who are you kid and why are you wearing my clothes?" The young lady asked you, clearly being as confused as you were. It suddenly hit you as you put two and two together from seeing how she could pass as a younger version of your mother. There was only way you could rationalize this scenario.

"Felix?" You could barely whisper. The whole thing almost made you faint. "You're... hot."

"And you're... cute." She responded in kind. From there, you piece together what had happened once more. You cross your legs to check and find nothing.

"I'm a girl too?" You almost fell over again from your legs giving up and you preparing to faint except Felix managed to catch and help you up.

"So I guess you're my little sister now?" Felix giggled to herself, having already stopped taking her own changes seriously.

"Shut up!" You glared at her. "We need to switch back right now." Since then, you have tried to find a way to reverse your changes, but that turns out easier said than done considering that ____.
12531.title: Lucas Campbell

13.content:
Who were you and how did you become younger than your children?

Claire Parkes: You were a 28-year old woman with a husband (Fred, age 31) and a daughter (Chloe, age 7). You and your husband were considering having another kid, much to the delight of your daughter. However, when trying to do so leads you to having a sudden illness that is eating away at your adult body, it quickly becomes clear that you are going to be the sibling your daughter desires.

Isabella Cortez: You were an explorer who, at the ripe age of 32, had few equals in terms of buxom beauty and personal strength. You would take your family to your travels, including your husband (Miguel, age 36), frustrated older daughter (Sofia, age 14), and curious younger daughter (Maya, age 8). Your days of roaming around come to a halt, though, when you fall into a certain ancient fountain.

Carol Rose: You were an over-protective helicopter mom of age 37 who would go out of your way to try to help your 11-year old daughter Melody succeed. It was only when Melody finally snaps at you that you start to become younger and younger. Maybe Melody's voice has magical properties.

Gretchen Miller: You were an ordinary mother of 40 who your family appreciates very much. Problems do arise, though, when your 16-year old daughter Rachel needs to care for a child to pass her home-economics class.and a strange allergic reaction causes you to regress into a child. Will Rachel be able to take care of you and pass while you recover without your 11-year old son Kyle and your 6-year old daughter Lilly embarrassing you too much?
13.title: Mother

131.content:
It was only yesterday when Claire and Fred told their daughter the good news.

"Honey?" Claire asked her. "How would you like to have a little brother or sister?"

"That would be wonderful! Thanks mommy and daddy!" the daughter, Chloe, beamed with joy.

That night, Clair and her husband, wanting to keep the family happy, got to work on their second kid. However, things would be not be as expected the morning after where this story takes place.

Claire wakes in what feels like sweat. She thinks at first that she is already having morning sickness and the baby is in the oven, but this feels far more different than when she first had Chloe. She stirs around the bed, trying to untangle herself from the bed sheets, finding that she has instead ___.
131.title: Claire Parkes

choices: she falls into some sparkling water
she is stopped by the fountain's stone ledge
they spot some hint of civilization nearby
132.content:
At least a week ago, Isabella had invited her family to join her on a hike within a secluded if not uncharted area in coastal Central America. Her husband and younger daughter remain intrigued to what the world had to offer. However, not everyone saw it that way.

"I don't see why we had to come along with you to the middle of nowhere," Sofia complains, wishing that she can finally go home and get back to being with her friends at school. Before the school year had even started, Isabella had enlisted her and her sister Maya to be home-schooled so the family can accompany her around the world, which leaves very little room for any sort of social life. Sometimes, she didn't know how everyone else can remain so enthusiastic, even if their priorities were clearly elsewhere.

"Aww! Don't be a sourpuss," Isabella fake-pouted.

"Your mother has been working really hard to accompany us for this trip," the father Miguel lightly scolds her daughter. "Just try to have some fun with it, okay?"

"Besides, we may be on to something here." Isabella opens a map she kept with her and continues pacing while keeping her eyes on the directions. "According to ancient legend, this is where the elusive and mythical 'Fountain of Youth' is rumored to take place. Even a single sip of the water there is said to rejuvenate months if not years of your life."

"Ooh!" Maya squeals with interest. Sofia just rolls her eyes. "So it can make grown-ups into little kids?"

"That's how the story goes," Isabella nods, still having her eyes on the map. "Now we just got to be careful. It's really easy to lose your step around he-."
132.title: Isabella Cortez

choices: all wet but alright for now
somewhat lighter than she was before
way smaller than she was a moment ago
1321.content: As if on cue, Isabella clumsily falls into a pond of sparkling water. Sofia holds back the urge to giggle while still checking if her mother is alright. Miguel, being more proactive, helps his wife out of the watery trap. At the moment, Isabella seems to be ...
1321.title: she falls into some sparkling water

choices: mom is young enough to be my big sister
mom is even smaller than me
mom is going to need diapers now
13213.content:
"Woah! No way. It's true." Sofia gawks at her mother in surprise.

'What? What happened?" Isabella turned to her daughter, but found herself having to look up to see her eyes. "Oh, no! Did the fountain do this? Why did I have to be such a klutz?"

Maya giggles from amazement. "___"
13213.title: way smaller than she was a moment ago

135.content:
Would either of these ladies do?

Vanessa Gaines: Until only a few days after summer started, you were a divorced 38-year old woman. You had been recently taken into court for shoplifting for the umpteenth time. Since you have two daughters who have recently been granted summer break, you were given a choice as to where to go from there: two years in prison or three months under house arrest in an experimental "time out" program. Of course, you have chosen the latter option, which, unfortunately for you, led to a treatment you didn't think was possible until now. With your older daughter Phoebe (18) agreeing to be your guardian for the summer, you hope she and your younger daughter Jasmine (8) will be easy on you now that you're smaller and younger than them.

Charlotte Hughes: You were once a 28-year old woman happily married to Gabe (30) and looking after your daughter Mabel (6). However, Mabel has a habit to borrow your clothes to play "dress up" without asking. After one day where you scold her for it, you start having days where your own clothes feel a little drafty and loose on you. Even when you try going for smaller sizes, you eventually come across this problem time and time again. Maybe there will be a day when you will be "playing dress up" with Mabel's clothes, but the thought of that is just ridiculous.
135.title: someone else

1351.content:
Expecting that nothing could go wrong and feeling that stealing thousands of dollars of merchandise from tens of stores over the years didn't call for you being separated from your daughters, you agreed to the terms for the experiment. You didn't know why Phoebe had to sign as much paperwork as you did (nor did you know why she seemed to be so excited and secretive about it), but you shrugged it off considering she is the only other person of consenting age to volunteer on her behalf. Right after, you were escorted for medical treatment. You had no idea what this had to do with anything either, but you couldn't rationalize anything about it as soon as the knock-out drugs put you to sleep.

"The operation was a success." You heard one of the doctors talk to someone from the hallway. It has apparently been a while since you have been treated. You opened your eyes and saw yourself in a surprisingly large recovery room. You slowly rose your head out of bed to try to see what's going on. "No. She will not need to be tagged. She won't be in any condition to drive anyway." You continued to listen in on the conversation, figuring out that they are talking about you, though you did not know what exactly they were talking about. "The government will also provide you a modest budget for whatever you need including food and clothes... even diapers if it turns out little Vanessa will need them."

'What?" You whispered curiously. You slammed one of your palms on your mouth when you heard a soft and childish voice escape your lips. You unraveled the surprisingly heavy sheets from yourself on the giant hospital bed. You were horrified to find that your breasts have disappeared. "What the hell?" You almost shouted as you instinctively covered your flat chest with your stubby hands. From the lack of curves and stature as well as abundance of baby fat, it is obvious you had somehow been turned into a child. Using your youngest daughter as a reference, you could guess that you been turned into a ____ girl.

"Are you ready to see your little sister?" The doctor asked the other person. You heard Phoebe respond with a tone that indicates that you should be afraid of what is to come.

"I'm as ready as I'll ever be." You hear Phoebe walk into the room. You flinched at the sight of her smirking and looking right into your eyes. "How are you doing, squirt?"
1351.title: Vanessa Gaines

choices: teaching her a lesson she won't forget
13513.content:
'Wow!" Phoebe gasps in surprise and lets out a little giggle. "You really are a little girl now." You yourself become stunned over how giant she is to you now, so much so, in fact, that you don't utter a word when she lifts you onto her arms with ease. Being pulled out of what turns out to have been your crib, you get unnerved over how far you are from the floor with your stubby legs sticking out uselessly in the air."You're so light and adorable too."

"Aww!" You hear your younger daughter, who is also older than you now, squeal from behind Phoebe. "I want to play with my new baby sister too!"

"Thut if, Jathmin! I'm thill your moffer!" You yell at her while trying not to cringe over your new babyish lisp. You already have had enough of how your daughters are treating you thus far. Phoebe looks over you with disapproval, something you would have expressed offense over if she didn't suddenly turn over to her sister with a mischievous smile.

"Okay, Jazz." She kneels down to hand you over. "You can help me with ___."
13513.title: 2-year old

1353.content:
Here are some more choices.

Samantha Cummings: Until now, you were a 28-year old woman still in her prime who had taken back your maiden name of 'Manning' following a divorce from your former fiancee Edward (age, 30). Both of you wanted to take custody over your daughter Tiffany (age, 7), but, due to your selfish personality, she preferred to stay with her father and you would not let that happen. However, just as the courts were about hand over custody to you, your daughter's wishes have been granted, leaving you in a state where you can't legally be a parent... nor legally live alone without parental guidance for that matter.

Whitney Walker: You were a 42-year old woman who just wanted to spend time with your teenage daughter Valerie (age, 14). However, as much as she intends to humor you, you find a lot of problems with that, considering that your daughter is not a little girl anymore. You wished to yourself that you could relive the past so you can bond with her again. Of course, you did not expect this would actually come true; nor did you expect that the wish would change you and not her.
1353.title: I need more choices

14.content:
So, you go from a patriarch to a little girl? Who are you and how did this happen?

Dennis Trent: You were a 33-year old body-builder who was married to a 30-year old Lillian. The two of you had a 6-year old son named Daniel. Your life as you know it would come to an end, though, when overexertion from exercising slowly changes your entire body.

James Cook: You were once a 36-year old man who was married to a 31-year old woman named Anna. You two parent two young girls: Ella (8) and Emma (6). The family becomes an all-girls club, though, when Anna gets you to ingest a drug with unexpected and severe side-effects, in an attempt to spice up your marriage. As 'Jenna', you'll have to be careful around the girls while you hope for a miracle.

Eric Bailey: You were a 47-year old man who was given a medical check-up. However, the procedure you were given was different from the one you were supposed to receive, making you a healthy young girl. Your wife (Melissa, 44), your son (Daniel, 17), your older daughter (Allison, 14), and your younger daughter (Penny, 9) will be in for quite a surprise.

Greg Jennings: You were a loving father at the age of 39 who loved to spend time with your oldest son (William, 13), middle son (Nick, 9), and youngest son (John, 5) through sports and teaching them how to become young men. This will become a challenge when you have a sudden change from a bug bite that takes away your manhood from you. Will your sons be able to accept this and will your 37-year old wife Stella be happy to finally raise a daughter for a change?
14.title: Father

143.content:
Eric can hear the beeping of medical equipment as he starts waking up. He does pause, though, from confusion towards his surroundings. Wasn't he hear for an ordinary check-up? Did he almost die somehow?

"Congratulations, Mr. Bailey," a voice that Eric can only conclude being that of his doctor exclaims. "The operation was a success."

"What do you mea-?" Eric's voice is much more feminine than he recalls it being. He checks on himself and sees that he has somehow become a ___.
143.title: Eric Bailey

choices: they are all as shocked/horrified as she is
they seem to have been aware of what would happen
they are not sure why they are here
1433.content:
Eric shrieks with his, or rather her, squeaky voice. "What the @*@^ did you to me, you &%#&ing quack?!" She uncovers her sheets, finding herself wearing a hospital gown she would only ever expect her youngest daughter, Penny, to be wearing. "You turned me into a &^$& little girl!"

"Language, young lady." The doctor dismisses her. "You got what you wanted."

"No! I didn't! I only came here for a check-up! How did you even do this?" Eric's new body is already starting to affect her judgement and make her tear up.

"Our apologies, then. The goods new is that your insurance will cover it. The bad news is that you have technically waivered away your ability to sue since you are now a minor."

"You-you can't do this to me! I have a wife and kids!" Eric is now starting to cry.

"Well, speaking of which, they're coming over right now to pick you up." the doctor continues to callously ignore Eric, who starts blabbing incoherently from fear.

"N-no! You need to fix this right now! I-!" But, at that moment, his family have arrived into the operating room. From the look on their faces, ___.
1433.title: five-year old girl

144.content:
You were playing catch with the boys one night. It had to come to an end, though, when a seemingly radioactive mosquito bit your leg without warning.

"Ow!" You screamed and stopped moving, giving the bug the opportunity needed to fly away. No one was expecting the bug bite to be as painful as it was... nor did anyone expect a large red bump to appear only a few seconds later.

"Are you alright, dad?" William asked you. Your other sons look at your bite with concern.

"I'm okay," you reassured them, though you were not sure whether that would really be true. All you knew was that you were actually feeling dizzy and weak. "I... I should go back inside. Sorry, boys." You were planning to get some early sleep tonight and get to the hospital for a check-up if you didn't feel better by next morning. However, before you got back indoors, you were already starting to experience symptoms you never thought were possible. You started rapidly changing into...
144.title: Greg Jennings

choices: you set up a family meeting
you ask Stella to help you get dressed
you go for a shower to clean yourself
1441.content:
Your legs lost their muscle and hair to the point that your pants would have fallen off if not for your widening hips. However, the loss of mass is enough for you to wobble and fall on your rear, which is much more thick than you remember it being.

"Dad?" William asks with concern while you feel like your face and chest has suddenly caught on fire. You had no idea why he looked so flustered as well, but the pain was the only thing in your mind at the time. Nick watched on with horror and John watched with confusion. None of the boys could do anything to help you.

"Ahh!" You let out a womanly scream from the pain reaching its peak. From your chest erupted two bulbous breasts that had absorbed and erased any pronounced abdominal muscles and semblance of an Adam's Apple you ever had. Thankfully, after a few more changes, your body finally cooled down and stopped causing agony. You and the boys remained silent to process what just happened.

"Greg?" Your wife Stella called out to you. "Are you ok-? oh my..." Stella's face turned white with horror and shock. Whether she could recognize you or not, you could tell this was not going to end well. After a few seconds of Stella experiencing a hurricane of emotions, she finally spoke up again. "Greg... you're a woman?"

"Huh?" You already had reasons to suspect this might have been the case, but you were not willing to believe that it was true. 1452.content:
You remember what happened as if it happened yesterday... because it was yesterday and during an otherwise normal Sunday. The sun slowly sunk into the horizon as the air remained contaminated with pollen and the heat was already rivaling that of a summer night. Your wife would not be back for another hour from her job, leaving the house all to yourself. You would usually consider this to be another typical spring season, but that is not the case. This year, your son will finally graduate from high school and, no doubt, find his way to the state university. You knew that he is a vastly intelligent young man (his GPA and the effort he puts into his homework is proof of that), but there was one thing about him that concerned you...

Your train of thought was interrupted from the sound of the front door being opened. A sullen Peter walked in and put away his shoes without making another sound. You wanted to help lighten his mood however you can.

"Hi, son." You did not know how to help him, however. This sort of problem is all too common for young men like him. "Are you excited about graduation?" You waited for a response. Peter did eventually respond, but it took a second and he clearly only responded to be polite.

"Sure am, dad. ...I'm not sure where I'll be from there, though." He whispered the last part and you didn't know how to take that. He went upstairs, no doubt to chat with his like-minded friends online. You sighed, figuring that he will most likely stay in his room for the night, only coming down for dinner or to brush his teeth. Ever since the senior year started, he had started doubting himself. You had no idea why he doubted his academic achievements, but you had a guess as to what was actually going on: he felt inadequate as a man when it comes to women. Until then, the fact that he and his friends mainly hung with each other and never anyone else didn't seem to bother him. However, with prom and later college only barely ahead of him, this form of isolation might have finally taken its toll. You could relate, having had similar feelings towards girls during your years in high school, though you would probably consider yourself luckier there. Then again, you were never the brainy type.

"I wish I can help that kid. Maybe I can be wing-man or something." You almost chuckled from how silly it was for you to be muttering to yourself. Not to mention, it's not like you would be of any valuable help as you are. Little did you know, your wish would soon come true, but, as if to provide a perform a form of cruel irony, it would come at the cost of you no longer being you. You would soon start to change ___.

Until at least a week ago, you were a Private in the Army. You were proud to serve your country, but, at the same time, you missed being able to see your wife and son, whom you had not seen for more than a year. You knew it was a heavy risk, but out of a brash sense of duty and hopes you can see your family again soon, you accepted their terms. However, only a day later, when you were placed onto an air-tight capsule and were subject to a special type of gas, the effects were beyond what anyone including yourself could ever expect.

However, you couldn't be too upset; you did this to yourself and it seemed like you would be excused to see your family again. You hoped that they would understand.

You spent the next few days being given intensive check-ups to make sure that your body wouldn't start failing. A few small changes occurred as those days past, but you were eventually confirmed to be a healthy and stable female. With that, you were finally and personally escorted home through a private jet under the company of some of your superior officers. Your wife, Monica, was informed of your return beforehand and your son, Luke, learned of this from her. You felt like it shouldn't matter for you are still you inside, though you did not deny that it would still be a big deal. info.brief_description: Someone permanently changes into a young lady and gets caught in a new family dynamic.
info.description:
RULES

1) Try to add in a decent amount of content each chapter (at least two sentences per chapter and all available choices filled).

2) Try to use at least decent grammar and spelling (minor mistakes will be ignored).

3) Please respect the content rating (this will mainly be enforced via common sense).

4) I have the right to delete or edit chapters if I have to (I'll try to send notifications for those cases).

5) Please don't delay the story using chapters with superfluous choices (character slots being the exception).

6) Please don't end a story branch (you can always start a new and related story afterwards if you really have to).

7) As you long as you follow the theme for this interactive and follow the other rules, feel free to mix things up.

8) Enjoy yourself and have fun.


HELPFUL NOTES

I have noticed that, even when it comes to myself, that sometimes past tense is used and sometimes present tense is used for chapters. To clarify, the first chapters are past tense for the sake of the prologue. You can switch to present tense as soon the changed young lady is noticed by her new siblings. This present tense should be the default afterwards for the sake of proper writing. However, I realize that some people may have been taught to write otherwise and I understand that this may be a bit confused. With that said, there is no need to panic if you end up alternating between the two as long as the story remains being fun to read.
